about_the_game:
About this game

Welcome to the Utopian world of dreams 1+1<2
Class is rigid here, but there are few risk-takers
There is no freedom here, because there is only obedience
Everything here is in order
If you don't want to be someone else's tool, it's worth the risk

Is it bad to dream all the time?
Beautiful dream, but someone broke in
You're running away from here, or you're not
Someone you love in the dream, staying here all the time

Can't understand what I'm saying?

The game is a story game without words, no matter what country you are the player can easily pick up this game.
The game is a classic horizontal puzzle game, but you can turn into Superman at certain moments in the game, and solve puzzles with pause time and instant time backwards
There are certain levels in the game where you need to solve puzzles together with characters of certain abilities
The game is very humane, there are a lot of save points, explore the scene to find decorations and jump keys to add interest

Personal Page

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=61YR1yz5KFs

About this game

Welcome to the Utopian world of dreams 1+1<2
Class is rigid here, but there are few risk-takers
There is no freedom here, because there is only obedience
Everything here is in order
If you don't want to be someone else's tool, it's worth the risk

Is it bad to dream all the time?
Beautiful dream, but someone broke in
You're running away from here, or you're not
Someone you love in the dream, staying here all the time

Can't understand what I'm saying?

The game is a story game without words, no matter what country you are the player can easily pick up this game.
The game is a classic horizontal puzzle game, but you can turn into Superman at certain moments in the game, and solve puzzles with pause time and instant time backwards
There are certain levels in the game where you need to solve puzzles together with characters of certain abilities
The game is very humane, there are a lot of save points, explore the scene to find decorations and jump keys to add interest

name: Hope

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 630 / 650m, AMD Radeon HD6570 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel core i7-8750H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660, Radeon R9-270
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

short_description: Help the protagonist escape from the inner world and make a choice.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Korean
